hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: When the moon hits Termina like a big pizza pie that's game over.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Spirit Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Game Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Top

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Game Key# and #the Serenade of Water#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #6# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say Ganon's tail is vulnerable to nuts, arrows, swords, explosives, hammers...^...sticks, seeds, boomerangs...^...rods, shovels, iron balls, angry bees...

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Time#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Deku Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Map of the Bottom of the Well#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #2# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.
